wikipedia_page.main: Victor Serebriakoff (17 October 1912  – 1 January 2000) was one of the early members and a leading light of Mensa. Serebriakoff is known for his contributions to lumber technology, writing Intelligence Quotient (IQ) tests, as well as organising and promoting Mensa.

response: * Victor Serebriakoff – author and former international president of MensaObituary – Victor Serebriakoff . . . – British Mensa
